name: Bug From The Tower
description:
Game created in 36h for 6th Warsaw Film School Game Jam. 

Stick to the green blocks, collect yellow "bananas", avoid bombs and other obstacles, go up. It's endless tower. 

Control: -> mostly mouse and 2 keys: R - restart, Q - quit the game. 

Credits: 

Kamil Nowak, Łukasz Harla, Igor Moryto, Piotr Mrowca, Olga Rudnicka
